DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy GS-9620 virologically suppress adult chronic hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) infection currently treat oral antiviral ( OAV ) . Participants randomize 3 sequential cohort . Within cohort , participant randomize 1:3:3:3 ratio placebo one dose GS-9620 ( 1 , 2 , 4 mg ) participant continue current oral antiviral treatment entire duration study . Cohorts A , B , C consist different treatment period 4 , 8 , 12 week , respectively , follow Week 48 . After Cohort A complete treatment , safety review conduct external data monitoring committee prior begin Cohort B . Another safety review conduct Cohort B complete treatment prior begin Cohort C .
